resources.string: The Information Technology department of P.E.S\'s Modern College of Engineering, Pune started in 2006 with an intake capacity of 60 students. This later increased to 120 from the year 2011-2012. The department of Information Technology at P.E.S\'s Modern College of Engineering is one of the few professionally runs premier Institutes working for the accomplishment of a mission to develop skilled IT professionals, by offering value-based quality education.
